name: Arcade Adventure Belt Slim - Unisex
description: Slimmed down to fit through smaller loops, but with all the goodness you expect from Arcade’s belts. Forged from durable nylon with a burly plastic buckle, the Adventure Belt keeps your pants up wherever you're headed, whatever you're doing. Goes with your snow pants, jeans or fancy pants. Yes, it really is that versatile.Flat, low-profile buckle is easy to open and close, yet won't get in the way during activity.Stretchy material and one-size-fits-most design is super comfy and does away with finding that perfect hole.Metal-free design is great for travel – no need to take it off at the airport.Machine washable, so you can leave it in your pants when they hit the wash.
